content: आवृत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Turning towards; return, coming back; तपोवनावृत्तिपथं <ls>R. 2. 18</ls>; <ls>Bg. 8. 23.</ls> {@--2@} Reversion, retreat, flight. {@--3@} Revolving, whirling, going round; <ls>Māl. 5. 4.</ls> {@--4@} Recurrence to the same point or place (of the sun); उदगावृत्तिपथेन नारदः <ls>R. 8. 33.</ls> {@--5@} Repetition of birth and death, worldly existence; अनावृत्तिभयं <ls>Ku. 6. 77.</ls> {@--6@} Repetition in general; an edition (modern use); सप्तमीयमंकनावृत्तिः seventh edition. {@--7@} Repeated reading, study; आवृत्तिः सर्वशास्त्राणां बोधादपि गरीयसी <ls>Udb.</ls> {@--8@} Use, employment, application. {@--9@} Turn of a way, course or direction. {@--10@} Occurrence.
